column4: is there a tourtial for installing windows XP AFTER I installed ubuntu ?
it is always better to install ubuntu after windows in my experience.  Windows does not play nicely with other operating systems.
I suggest you not install the virus from Redmond Washington at all.  Your machine and you, ultimately, will be better off.
shut up. I just want to play some games
however the only way to fix it is by installing XP and using vistabootpro
